Posts.Content: daisymae8585 wrote: for those undergoing frequent surveillance (mammograms and breast MRIs alternating) is anyone concerned about the IV dye contrast used in MRIs and how this could affect the kidneys over time? Also, with how mammograms started at an earlier age exposes a person to increased radiation? Just wondering if anyone had discussed this with their doctor? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: risk of repeated breast mri? daisymae8585 slv58
